tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FarmManagement (
 id INT,
 field_id INT,
 schedule_time TIMESTAMP,
 water_usage FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Irrigation (
    irrigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farm_id INT NOT NULL,
    irrigation_date DATE,
    amount_used DECIMAL(10,2),
    CONSTRAINT fk_farm_id FOREIGN KEY (farm_id)
        REFERENCES Farm(farm_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Field (
  field_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  field_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  farm_id UUID NOT NULL,
  area DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (field_id, farm_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (farm_id) REFERENCES Farm(farm_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IrrigationSchedule (
  schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  field_id UUID NOT NULL,
  start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  end_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  water_usage DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES Field(field_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WaterUsageLog (
  log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  field_id UUID NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  water_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES Field(field_id)
);

CREATE TABLE farm (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    established_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE irrigation_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farm_id INT,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    duration_minutes INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (farm_id) REFERENCES farm(id)
)

CREATE TABLE water_usage (
    usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farm_id INT,
    date DATE,
    amount_used INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (farm_id) REFERENCES farm(id)
)

CREATE TABLE crop (
    crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    type VARCHAR(255),
    harvest_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE crop_planting (
    planting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT,
    farm_id INT,
    planting_date DATE,
    quantity INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crop(crop_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (farm_id) REFERENCES farm(id)
)
